ygData.title: Vanguys (etc!)
ygData.description: Vanguys is a BRITISH COLUMBIA list for FTMs & FTM-questioning, only. To join, please send a brief comment saying why you'd like to join & indicate your location. IF YOU DON'T SEND THIS INFO, YOU WILL NOT BE APPROVED). Note that this list is not for non-FTM/questioning partners, friends, allies, care providers, researchers etc. There are many lists out there for folks interested in learning more about & supporting us & who don't identify as FTM/FTM-questioning, so this list is just for us. Vanguys is for anybody who self identifies as FTM (Female to Male) or is exploring whether this identity is right for them. The definition of FTM is open-ended & can mean many things. Some folks who wish to take hormones &/or have surgery, others are fine in their bodies but prefer wearing "male" clothing, some want hormones, some want surgery without the hormones. Not all of us identify as male all the time. It's whatever makes you comfortable, whatever you feel defines you as FTM...etc! If any of this fits you, then welcome! Privacy Note: Please do NOT share anything from this list without the explicit permission of the poster. Breaches of privacy are taken seriously & may result in being removed from the group. We all have different experiences & one thing i hope we can agree on is that racism, sexism, fatphobia, transphobia or non-binary phobia, queerphobia, ableism, anti s*x worker bias, classism, etc. are not tolerated in this group. Say what you like here, but if it crosses these lines you'll be cautioned; continued inappropriate comments can result in stronger warnings, up to & including removal from the list. If you're sincerely unsure of whether a term/comment/slang/etc might be seen as offensive, you're welcome to run it by the list owner first, prior to posting. Listen if folks tell you something you've said is hurting them. Let's keep it supportive!
ygData.name: vanguys
